author: julianfoad
msg: When the test suite encounters a tree mismatch and prints the expected and
actual trees, print them in a stable sorted order for easier visual
(node_is_greater): Delete, as this function was unused. The new
SVNTreeNode.__cmp__() is a functional replacement for it anyway.
(dump_tree): Sort the children before displaying them.

author: arfrever
msg: Move declarations of svn_auth_get_(gnome_keyring|kwallet)_* to svn_auth.h.

author: hwright
msg: Make sure we don't disown a file when checksumming it.  This fixes a
(svn_io_file_checksum2): Have the file stream own the file.  Also fix

author: julianfoad
msg: Factor out some generic array manipulation logic from the code that handles
Create functions for searching and inserting in a generic sorted APR array.
Replace the search function find_child_or_parent() and the insertion
function insert_child_to_merge() with functions that do the same jobs using
the generic helpers. Stop requiring the caller to remember the index where
the next item should be inserted, as that is error-prone.
(compare_merge_path_t_as_paths): Move this function to an earlier point in
the source file. Add a doc string.
process_children_with_new_mergeinfo): Adjust for the above changes,
